item.title: PBS Service Recovery
item.description: PBS Service Recovery The following covers restoring PBS data. Prerequisites The system is fully installed and has transitioned off of the LiveCD. All activities required for site maintenance are complete. A backup or export of the data already exists. Service recovery for PBS To restore PBS Professional data from backup, follow section 10.7.7 Restore PBS home directory from backup in the HPE Cray Programming Environment Installation Guide: CSM on HPE Cray EX Systems (S-8003).

item.title: Slurm Service Recovery
item.description: Slurm Service Recovery The following covers restoring Slurm data. Prerequisites The system is fully installed and has transitioned off of the LiveCD. All activities required for site maintenance are complete. A backup or export of the data already exists. Service recovery for Slurm To restore Slurm data from backup, follow sections 10.3.11 Restore Slurm Accounting Database from Backup and 10.3.13 Restore Slurm Spool Directory from Backup in the HPE Cray Programming Environment Installation Guide: CSM on HPE Cray EX Systems (S-8003).
